dashboard.description: Your all-in-one platform for a healthier, more connected life.
dashboard.descriptionGuest: Your all-in-one platform for a healthier, more connected life. Please sign in or create an account to access your personalized health dashboard.

emergency.title: Emergency Hub
emergency.description: Access ambulance, broadcast, and hospital notification services.

findHospital.title: Find a Hospital
findHospital.description: Search for specialist hospitals based on your condition and location.

findDoctor.title: Find a Doctor
findDoctor.description: Search for doctors by specialization, location, and more.

myAppointments.title: My Appointments
myAppointments.description: View and manage your upcoming and past doctor consultations.

mealPlanner.title: AI Meal Planner
mealPlanner.description: Get personalized meal suggestions based on your dietary needs and preferences.

prescriptionManager.title: Prescription Manager
prescriptionManager.description: Track your medications and set reminders to stay on top of your health.

orderMedicines.title: Order Medicines
orderMedicines.description: Upload a prescription or manually add items to order from pharmacies.

vitalsTracker.title: Vitals Tracker
vitalsTracker.description: Log and monitor key health metrics like blood pressure, sugar levels, and more.

responseTime.title: Response Time Test
responseTime.description: Measure your reaction time with this simple cognitive test.

connectDevices.title: Connect Devices
connectDevices.description: Sync your smart watch or health band to automatically track your vitals.

journal.title: Mental Health Journal
journal.description: Record your thoughts and emotions to gain insights into your mental well-being.

supportGroups.title: Peer-Support Groups
supportGroups.description: Connect with others in anonymous, judgment-free discussion communities.

bloodDonors.title: Blood Donor Connector
bloodDonors.description: Find or register as a blood donor to help save lives in your community.

fitness.title: Inclusive Fitness
fitness.description: Discover accessible fitness trainers and classes tailored to your needs.

caregiverHub.title: Caregiver Hub
caregiverHub.description: Monitor a loved one's health, appointments, and medication adherence.
